content: about the headband the cable headband the cable headband is a classical design that will keep your ears and front worm on those cold days only little yarn is needed which makes it a handy choice for leftover yarn it is beginner friendly as only a few techniques are needed however you should be familiar with knitting in the round the headband is approx 8 5 cm wide the length varies according to your head size see table below sizes xs / s / m / l / xl suggested needles the headband is knitted on needle size 3 0 mm gauge 25 sts and 26 row equal 10 x 10 cm materials the headband on the photo is made of 1 strand soft silk mohair and 1 strand merino from knitting for olive held together project can easily be used for stash yarn it is a quick project to knit
